article.title: Euphoria_%28disambiguation%29
article.paragraph: wiktionaryeuphoriaEuphoriais an emotional and mental state defined as a sense of great elation and well being.

list.listitem: Euphoria (beetle)''Euphoria'' (beetle), a genus of scarab beetles
